activities: Sales and marketing activities related to demand response program participation and energy efficiency / energy intelligence services. After Sales and Marketing, information is used by EnerNOC to conduct demand response events and energy efficiency / energy intelligence services with contracted customers.
eucountries: Austria, Germany, Ireland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer data (both electronically via website and manually / electronically via contract)
privacyprograms:
We adhered to the following standards/programs:
BS 7799/ISO 17700
ISO/IEC 27001:2005
ISO/IEC 27002
recoursemech: For questions or concerns regarding EnerNOC's privacy statements, the first point of contact is to write to Thomas Birmingham at tbirmingham@enernoc.com. For any unresolved complaints or if a complaint is not satisfactorily addressed, the organization will utilize the applicable European Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) as its dispute resolution mechanism.
